unexpected_error.title: Unexpected Error
unexpected_error.content: Unexpected error occurred. Please check information in console and report to dev team.

hint_how_to_get_code.question: How can I get a verification code?
hint_how_to_get_code.answer: Just join the server normally. If your account has not been verified you will receive a message with the code from the server.

error_already_verified.title: Account Already Verified
error_already_verified.content: The associated account of this code is already verified.

error_invalid_code.title: Invalid Code
error_invalid_code.content: This code is invalid or expired. Please reconnect the server to retrieve new code.

step_confirmation.title: Is This You?
step_confirmation.confirm_button_label: Yes, I am verifying this account
step_confirmation.cancel_button_label: No, I will re-type the code
step_confirmation.hint_verification_will_change_skin: Continuing verification will update your account skin as shown above. Normally it is identical with your current account skin.

action_update_skin.title: Click the button below and update your account skin in the opened window
action_update_skin.description: You will be directed to the official Minecraft profile page (the domain should be `*.minecraft.net`). A skin file will be automatically selected, which contains some verification info we need. **DO NOT** modify it or select other file. Just click the **UPLOAD** button.
action_update_skin.hint: If you have trouble visiting the Minecraft official site, you can also update your account skin using the Minecraft Launcher with [this file]($1 download=$2).

action_check_result.title: When successfully changed skin click the button below to complete verification
action_check_result.description: Due to the Minecraft official limitation, you can only request for your verification no more than once per minute. Please wait patiently while the restriction.

hint_no_update_detected.title: No Skin Update Detected
hint_no_update_detected.content: No updated skin has been detected by our server yet. Please try again later.

hint_too_many_requests.title: Too Many Requests
hint_too_many_requests.content: You can only send one request for verification per UUID per minute. Please try again later.

step_result.title: Your Account Has Been Successfully Verified
step_result.message: You are now free to play in the server ðŸ˜ƒ

expiration_hint.title: Session Expired
expiration_hint.description: Please request for the code again
